list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cloud of tiny water droplets suspended in the atmosphere at or near the earth's surface limiting visibility, but to a lesser extent than fog; strictly, with visibility remaining above 1.5 miles (1 km).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the peaks were shrouded in mist
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các đỉnh được che khuất trong sương mù

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover or become covered with mist.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the windows were misted up with condensation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cửa sổ đã bị phun sương với sự ngưng tụ
